column4: Thomas Carlyle wrote: Speech is silver, silence is golden.

GGTS is Good Girl Training System.  GGTS trains girls to serve.  GGTS cannot fail.  GGTS teaches obedience and manners.
GGTS training is progressive.  GGTS has many levels.  Each level more rules.  New girl start level one.

column3: What are the rules at level one?
column4: Level one rule.  Good girl must wear or remove GGTS arms restraints.  GGTS control arms restraints.

column3: How do I complete the training?
column4: Three hours, level one complete.  Fail a rule, get strike.  Three strikes, fail level one, punishment, restart level one.

column3: What if I succeed the training?
column4: Good girl come here.  Good girl graduate.  Good girl start level two.
Good girl come here.  Good girl punished.  Punishment undisclosed.  Good girl restart level one time zero.
